public function getBooks($start = 0, $limit = 2, $order = ""ASC"") { $sql_start = $start * $limit; $sql_limit = $limit; $sql_order_by = $order; $query = ""SELECT Library.nameOfBook, userBook.book_id, userBook.user_id FROM loginUser JOIN userBook JOIN Library ON userBook.user_id = loginUser.id AND userBook.book_id = Library.id WHERE loginUser.username=:username ORDER BY Library.nameOfBook $sql_order_by LIMIT $sql_start, $sql_limit""; $statment = $this->db->prepare($query); $statment->execute([ ':username' => $this->username ]); $result = $statment->fetchAll(); echo """"; foreach($result as $row){ echo """"; echo """"; echo """"; echo """"; } echo ""
Books Action
"" . $row['nameOfBook'] . """" ."""" . ""
""; echo """"; return count($result); }
